update.description:
We updated for python3 compatibility in pull request #541, but this was reverted in upstream homebrew in order to maintain compatibility with PEP 394. The python@2 formula is now the one that installs the `python` symlink to `/usr/local/bin`, so we can continue using that. Also, a bug in the protobuf formula has been fixed, so we can remove some code from pull request #541.

Finally, we can use homebrew tags again since a new release has been made.

Test builds:

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64&build=841)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64/841/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64/841/

update.description:
We updated for python3 compatibility in pull request #541, but this was reverted in upstream homebrew in order to maintain compatibility with PEP 394. The python@2 formula is now the one that installs the `python` symlink to `/usr/local/bin`, so we can continue using that. Also, a bug in the protobuf formula has been fixed, so we can remove some code from pull request #541.

Finally, we can use homebrew tags again since a new release has been made.
